Maintenance Services

Comprehensive care for your website's health and performance

Technical Maintenance

Keep your website's foundation strong with these essential technical services:

  • Core software, plugin, and theme updates
  • Broken link detection and repair
  • Database optimization and cleanup
  • Backup system implementation and monitoring
  • Compatibility testing with new browser versions
  • SSL certificate monitoring and renewal
  • Uptime monitoring and outage response

Content Maintenance

Keep your content fresh and engaging with these services:

  • Content updates and revisions
  • Blog post publishing (provided by client)
  • Image optimization and updates
  • Broken media link repair
  • Seasonal content updates
  • Event/promotion page creation
  • Content formatting and SEO enhancements

Security Maintenance

Protect your website and customer data with these security services:

  • Security plugin configuration and monitoring
  • Malware scanning and removal
  • Firewall implementation and management
  • Brute force attack protection
  • Vulnerability patching
  • Two-factor authentication setup
  • Security audit reports

Performance Maintenance

Ensure your website loads quickly and runs smoothly:

  • Monthly performance audits
  • Image compression and optimization
  • Caching configuration and optimization
  • CDN setup and monitoring
  • Database optimization
  • Code minification
  • Load time testing and improvements

Maintenance FAQs

Answers to common questions about our website maintenance services

What's included in website maintenance?

Our maintenance services include regular updates, security monitoring, backups, performance optimization, content updates (depending on plan), and technical support. Each plan offers different levels of these services tailored to your website's needs.

How often will my website be updated?

Update frequency depends on your plan: Basic (monthly), Professional (weekly), and Enterprise (immediate). Critical security updates are applied as soon as they're available regardless of plan.

Do you provide emergency support?

Yes, our Professional and Enterprise plans include emergency support. Basic plan clients can request emergency support for an additional fee.

Can I cancel anytime?

Absolutely. There are no long-term contracts, and you can cancel your maintenance plan anytime with 30 days notice.

Do you maintain all types of websites?

We maintain websites built on WordPress, Shopify, WooCommerce, and custom CMS platforms. We also maintain static HTML sites. Contact us if you have a specialized platform.
